mainText:
I recieved my first mac book pro and only mac in the end of the summer 
of 2009. It was the best thing ever and still is. I use it almost 
everyday and love it. I think and still think that Steve Jobs was the 
greatest inventor ever and creates great things. I also have a I-pod 
touch which is great too. Steve jobs will always be remembered as a great person and inventor.
author: Evan
